summary: Project to deploy an application with an admin page and role-based access, initially granting sole admin rights to the user’s Internet Identity principal.
architectural_notes: Use an admin allowlist keyed by Internet Identity principal; initially operate in single-admin mode (only one principal has admin rights).

existing_features.title: Update the Admin Access Management UI (/admin/access) to reflect single-admin mode by disabling or removing the “Add New Admin” and “Remove Administrator” actions and showing an English explanation that admin access is locked to the owner principal.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement admin access control: make the provided Internet Identity principal the sole admin (single-admin mode) and enforce permissions on the admin page.
Grant admin privileges to the Internet Identity principal "zq4an-uqz34-isqap-u5moy-4rxll-vz3ff-ndqph-gvmn5-hqe6u-o6j3v-yqe" and ensure it remains the only administrator (single-admin mode).

Enforce single-admin mode in the admin-management APIs: only the owner principal "zq4an-uqz34-isqap-u5moy-4rxll-vz3ff-ndqph-gvmn5-hqe6u-o6j3v-yqe" can call admin-management endpoints, and add/remove operations must be blocked so no additional admins can be created and the owner cannot be removed/demoted.

projectName: Make provided principal the sole admin (single-admin mode)
